Detailed Description

This is the abstract class for the solution of the mass and energy balances at the wall.

◆ setDiffusionModel()

virtual void setDiffusionModel ( const Eigen::VectorXd &  v_mole_frac_edge,
const double &  dx 
)
inlinevirtual

Function which set ups the diffusion model in order to compute the gradient of mole fractions.

Requires as input a mole fraction vector for the chemical state of the gas near the surface and a distance these mole fractions are computed in meters.

Parameters
v_mole_frac_edgemole fractions at a distance from the surface used to compute the gradient for diffusion
dxdistance from the surface in m

Reimplemented in SurfaceBalanceSolverMassEnergy, and SurfaceBalanceSolverMass.

const double &  dx 
)
inlinevirtual

Function which set ups the conductive heat flux model necessary for the energy balance.

Requires as input the temperature vector at a distance from the surface and the distance in meters.

Parameters
v_T_edgetemperatures at a distance from the surface used to compute the gradient for diffusion
dxdistance from the surface in m
